title: New: Bayy – My Best Friend
content:
Blog come label, Beech Coma have a real knack for uncovering blurry, sun-drenched little gems.

My Best Friend from Brighton’s BAYY is no exception, sporting lovely production, shoegaze sensibilities and bleary vocals. This band is sure to build momentum leading into the summer months.

Beech Coma Vol. 1 can be pre-ordered here, featuring BAYY, Paeris Giles and Sherbert amongst others.
